text: When a solute is present in trace quantities the following expression is used.

options.d: Nano gram percent e) Parts per million

hint: Conceptual  LEVEL-1 7. If 25 ml of 0.25 M NaCl solution is diluted with water to a volume of 500 ml the new concentration of the solution is  a) 0.0125 M b) 0.167 M c) 0.833 M d) 0.0167 M Key: a
